hero.subline: Strategic pricing, premium marketing, and sharp negotiation to maximize your sale.

seo.title: Sell Your Home in Orange County, NY | Panorama Realty
seo.description: Get a local pricing strategy and full-funnel marketing plan from Panorama Realty.

marketingPlan.title: How We Market Your Home
marketingPlan.subline: A full campaign, not just an MLS post.

items.title: Professional Photography
items.desc: Wide-angle, high-resolution visuals optimized for buyer click-through.

items.title: Video and Drone
items.desc: Cinematic footage for properties where visuals drive stronger offers.

items.title: MLS and Portal Syndication
items.desc: Distributed across high-intent search channels and broker networks.

items.title: Paid Social Promotion
items.desc: Audience-targeted campaigns to reach qualified local and relocation buyers.

items.title: Agent-to-Agent Exposure
items.desc: Immediate promotion across active agent and buyer circles.

items.title: Open House Strategy
items.desc: Broker previews and public opens when they support your pricing strategy.

items.title: Free Home Evaluation
items.description: We provide a practical pricing range based on comparable sales, active competition, and likely buyer demand.

items.title: Marketing + Creative Production
items.description: Professional photography, launch copy, digital promotion, and channel strategy tailored to your property.

items.title: Negotiation and Transaction Support
items.description: From offer review to inspection and closing, we structure terms to protect value and reduce surprises.

items.title: Worried about underpricing?
items.description: We model comparables, absorption, and timing windows to set a defendable list price.

items.title: Unsure about prep budget?
items.description: We prioritize only high-ROI repairs and staging improvements.

items.title: Concerned about timing your next move?
items.description: We coordinate your sale timeline with your buy or relocation plan.

items.name: A. Thompson
items.quote: Panorama gave us a pricing strategy we could actually trust, and we accepted a strong offer in under three weeks.

items.name: M. Rivera
items.quote: The communication was excellent from prep through closing. We always knew exactly what the next step was.

items.title: If inventory is low in your segment
items.description: Lower competition can increase leverage and reduce days on market.

items.title: If your next move is already planned
items.description: A clear purchase/relocation plan usually improves your timing decisions and negotiation confidence.

items.title: If small updates can materially raise value
items.description: Targeted prep often outperforms broad renovations when deciding whether to list this season.

stagingTips.headline: Staging and Prep Tips
items: Declutter high-traffic rooms and remove oversized furniture.
Use neutral paint touch-ups in key visual areas.
Improve first impression with entryway and curb updates.
Fix minor deferred maintenance before photos and showings.
Use lighting and layout to make rooms feel larger and brighter.

items.title: Recommended Movers
items.description: Vetted local movers for full-service and short-notice moves.

items.title: Home Prep Vendors
items.description: Painting, handyman, cleaning, and light staging partners.

items.title: Closing Partners
items.description: Trusted attorneys, inspectors, and title professionals.
